snippet.title: Quick gameplay overview
snippet.description:
Work for every resource.
Every item is player crafted.
Other players will kill you. Or can you kill them?
They will steal your items. Or will you steal theirs?

Now Available to Wishlist on Steam!
Come and join us on this epic journey: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2438410/The_World_of_Nifty_Craft/
